entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Leonard
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22 except minus 28 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Low minus 22 except minus 28 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
